name: feedmaker
description: GCR service for generating user feeds.

scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn --cwd=../../common alias && yarn --cwd=../shared alias && yarn alias && yarn dist
scripts.dist:prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/common/lib dist/backend/shared/lib dist/backend/feedmaker/lib
scripts.dist:copy: cp -R ../../common/lib/* dist/common/lib && cp -R ../shared/lib/* dist/backend/shared/lib && cp -R ./lib/* dist/backend/feedmaker/lib && cp ../../yarn.lock dist && cp package.json dist
